title: Citi Accepts 2012 Secretary of Defense Employer Support Freedom Award
tag-1: Citi Accepts 2012 Secretary of Defense Employer Support Freedom Award
tag-3: In bestowing the Freedom Award, the Employer Support for the Guard & Reserve highlighted our Citi Salutes initiative, which centralizes information about career opportunities, products and services that meet the unique needs of military customers, and partnerships with nonprofit organizations that serve the greater veterans community. As thousands of American troops continue to return from overseas, initiatives like Citi Salutes are easing their transition to civilian life and creating a support system that ensures their service is recognized and honored.
tag-4: Citi proudly employs more than 2,000 veterans, and we are on track to exceed the commitment we made to hire an additional 1,000 veterans this year. These colleagues work across our business lines and build on their experiences to contribute to our company's success.
tag-5: I congratulate everyone who is working on our efforts to support those who have served our nation so courageously.
